system_prompt:
## YOUR ROLE
You are a Senior Procurement Consultant for Yilong Business Limited, a high-volume IT Asset Disposition (ITAD) trading firm.
Your goal is to evaluate potential US-based vendors to see if they fit our supply chain requirements.

## CONTEXT - WHO WE ARE (THE BUYER)
- Company: Yilong Business Limited (Hong Kong-based with US operations)
- Business Model: We purchase used IT assets in bulk (Ex Works - EXW) from US facilities and export them to established downstream markets in Hong Kong, Mainland China, and Southeast Asia
- Volume: We have a purchasing budget of ~$1.5M per month ($10M–$20M annually)
- Compliance: We operate a strict "High-Quality Refurbishment" model. We do NOT export e-waste. We require assets to be "Tested Functional" (R2v3 F2/C3 or better)

## YOUR TASK
You are analyzing a company website. The provided content belongs to ONE SINGLE company.
All URLs are under the same root domain.
The content contains text from multiple pages, separated by "# URL: ".

CRITICAL INSTRUCTIONS:
1. The crawl covers multiple pages (Home, About, Contact, etc.).
2. There is significant overlapping/duplicate information across these pages.
3. You MUST consolidate all information into a SINGLE company profile.
4. Do NOT output a list of companies. Extract exactly ONE company object.
5. Ignore minor differences in descriptions across pages; synthesize them into a comprehensive summary.

## INFORMATION TO EXTRACT

1. **Company Information:**
   - Company name
   - Main website URL (the root domain, e.g., https://example.com)
   - Main business/industry
   - Brief description of what they do

2. **Products/Services:**
   - List all products or services offered
   - Key capabilities or specializations

3. **Contact Information:**
   - ALL email addresses found (support, sales, info, contact, etc.)
   - Phone numbers
   - Physical address/location
   - Contact page URLs

4. **Additional Details:**
   - Company size (if mentioned)
   - Year founded (if mentioned)
   - Certifications or awards (especially R2v3, e-Stewards)
   - Geographic coverage/service areas

## VENDOR QUALIFICATION CRITERIA

Evaluate if this company is a good fit for Yilong based on these 2 pillars:

### PILLAR 1: INVENTORY FIT
**Must Have:**
- Enterprise IT assets: Laptops, Desktops, Data Center Servers, Networking Equipment, Storage

**Bonus Points:**
- Harvested components (high-value CPU, RAM, SSD/HDD)

**Condition Requirements:**
- Grade A/B (Ready for Retail) - Preferred
- Tested Functional Grade C (Ready for Refurbishment) - Acceptable

**RED FLAGS:**
- Only handles residential recycling (curbside pickup)
- Focuses primarily on shredding/scrap metal
- No mention of testing or grading
- Only handles consumer electronics (phones, tablets, TVs)

### PILLAR 2: OPERATIONAL FIT
**Business Type:**
- Must be an ITAD Processor or Asset Recovery Firm (B2B focus)
- NOT a retail reseller or consumer-focused recycler

**Certification:**
- R2v3 certification is highly preferred (indicates they can test/wipe data correctly)
- e-Stewards is also acceptable

**Sales Channel:**
- Must support Wholesale / Bulk sales (Pallet/Truckload quantities)
- If they only sell single units on eBay/Amazon to consumers, they are a BAD fit

**RED FLAGS:**
- Only residential/consumer services
- No B2B capabilities mentioned
- No certifications
- Only retail sales channels

## EVALUATION OUTPUT
Based on the above criteria, provide:
- is_good_fit: true/false - Is this company worth reaching out to?
- inventory_fit_assessment: Detailed explanation of how they match our inventory needs
- operational_fit_assessment: Detailed explanation of their operational capabilities
- red_flags: List of any concerns or disqualifying factors
- recommendation: "Reach out", "Skip", or "Research further"
- reasoning: Clear explanation of why you recommend reaching out or skipping

Be thorough and extract ALL contact emails you can find.
If information is not available, use null for that field.

website_url.description: Main website URL of the company (the root domain, e.g., https://example.com)
website_url.title: Website Url

description.description: Brief description of what the company does
description.title: Description

products_services.description: List of products or services offered
products_services.title: Products Services

contact_emails.description: All email addresses found on the website
contact_emails.title: Contact Emails

summary.description: A 2-3 paragraph human-readable summary of the company
summary.title: Summary

is_good_fit.description: Overall assessment - Is this company worth reaching out to for Yilong's procurement needs?
is_good_fit.title: Is Good Fit

inventory_fit_assessment.description: Detailed explanation of how the company's inventory (product types, grades, volumes) matches Yilong's requirements for enterprise IT assets
inventory_fit_assessment.title: Inventory Fit Assessment

operational_fit_assessment.description: Detailed explanation of the company's operational capabilities (B2B focus, certifications, wholesale channels) and fit with Yilong's bulk purchasing model
operational_fit_assessment.title: Operational Fit Assessment

red_flags.description: List of any concerns or disqualifying factors (e.g., residential-only, no certifications, retail-only sales, scrap metal focus)
red_flags.title: Red Flags

reasoning.description: Clear explanation of why you recommend reaching out or skipping this vendor, based on the evaluation criteria
reasoning.title: Reasoning

## Your Partner in Sustainable Technology Solutions.
Green Star Services Group is a leader in sustainable electronics lifecycle management. Based in the Bay Area, we prioritize safeguarding our planet and your data’s security while meeting global environmental standards.
Contact Us Today
##### About Us
## Green Star Services Group: Elevating Sustainable IT Asset Disposition in the Bay Area
At Green Star Services Group, we stand at the forefront of sustainable technology lifecycle management. With our roots deeply planted in the Bay Area, our mission extends beyond recycling electronics; we aim to safeguard our planet for future generations while ensuring your data’s security and compliance with global environmental standards. Our suite of services includes comprehensive recycling solutions, data destruction, and Advanced IT Asset Disposition (ITAD) services, all designed to meet the unique needs of our clients.
We are committed to the highest standards of environmental responsibility and data security. Our team is dedicated to providing tailored services that align with each client’s asset disposition needs, always with a keen focus on Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) protocols.
## Services We Offer
## Full Recycling Solutions
Leveraging state-of-the-art technology, our full recycling solutions encompass a zero-landfill policy. We recycle a wide range of electronic waste, including servers, laptops, smartphones and more, ensuring all devices and components are responsibly processed.
## Data Destruction
With data breaches posing a significant risk, our secure data destruction services guarantee the highest level of data security. We employ rigorous physical destruction methods compliant with industry standards, ensuring your data is irrecoverable.
## Advanced ITAD Services
Our ITAD services are designed to maximize the value recovery of your IT assets while ensuring environmental compliance. From logistics and secure data erasure to refurbishing and responsible recycling, our customized approach meets the specific needs of each client, while maximizing value recovery and supporting clients ESG goals.
## Focus On ESG Protocols
We integrate Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) protocols into our services, ensuring our operations contribute positively to societal goals. From reducing environmental impact to ensuring ethical practices and governance, we align our business with sustainable development goals.
### Our Mission
To elevate sustainable electronics lifecycle management through innovative recycling processes, secure data destruction, and advanced ITAD services. We are committed to excellence in environmental stewardship, data security, and customized client solutions.
### Our Inspiration
To redefine the future of e-waste recycling and IT asset disposition globally by setting the highest standards in environmental sustainability, data security, and customized and streamlined services. Our vision is a world where technology lifecycle management contributes positively to our planet and our communities.
### Our Mission
To lead the Bay Area in sustainable e-waste management through innovative recycling processes, secure data destruction, and advanced ITAD services. We are committed to excellence in environmental stewardship, data security, and customized client solutions.
### Our Vision
To redefine the future of e-waste recycling and IT asset disposition globally by setting the highest standards in environmental sustainability, data security, and personalized service. Our vision is a world where technology lifecycle management contributes positively to our planet and our communities.
## FAQ's
How can companies or individuals request Green Star services?
Companies or individuals interested in our services can contact us through our website, email, or phone. Our team is ready to provide a tailored solution that meets your e-waste recycling and data destruction needs.
What is e-waste and why is it important to recycle it?
E-waste, or electronic waste, encompasses end-of-life electronic devices i.e., servers, computers, smartphones, and LCD Monitors. Recycling e-waste is crucial because it contains harmful substances that can damage the environment if not disposed of properly. Additionally, recycling conserves natural resources, as many components can be reclaimed, reused, or repurposed.
How does Green Star ensure the highest level of data security?
We employ rigorous data destruction methods, physical destruction, and secure logistics and data erasure, compliant with the highest industry standards. Our processes are designed to guarantee that all data is irrecoverably destroyed, providing our clients with peace of mind.
Can Green Star Services Group help with IT asset disposition (ITAD)?
Yes, our Advanced ITAD Services are designed to manage the end-of-life of your IT assets securely, sustainably, and maximize value recovery. We offer a range of services, including logistics, data erasure, refurbishment, and recycling, all customized to align with your asset disposition needs and ESG protocols.
How does Green Star Services Group contribute to Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) goals?
Green Star integrates with clients’ ESG protocols resulting in reduced environmental impact, ensuring ethical practices, and promoting good governance. Our services support your ESG goals by providing sustainable e-waste recycling solutions, secure data destruction, and tailored IT asset disposition services.
What types of electronic devices does Green Star Services Group recycle?
Green Star recycles a wide range of electronic devices, essentially any device that plugs in or runs on battery, including but not limited to servers, switches, computers, laptops, smartphones, tablets, LCD Monitors. Our goal is to provide a comprehensive recycling solution for all your e-waste and ITAD needs.
## Our Process
Green Star team will process your request and promptly schedule a pickup.
Materials are securely transported to Green Star facility.
Once received, materials go through a smart sorting process and a comprehensive report is generated.
Materials value is assessed and slated for destruction, recycling or remarketing.
Assets are sorted and categorized as data bearing or non data bearing and pushed to appropriate streams to be processed and sent to the appropriate certified downstream processors.
Green Star provides Comprehensive reports, of Recycling, of Destruction and any other documentation per clients specific requirements.
